gui

Class DateRowFilter<M,I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.RowFilter<M,I>
      • gui.DateRowFilter<M,I>
  • Type Parameters:
    M - Type of the model
    I - Type of the identifier (Integer if used for a TableRowSorter)

    public class DateRowFilter<M,I>
extends RowFilter<M,I>
    Filter that extends a RowFilter, it is used to filter a table to let see only the values with a date between the minimum and the maximum
    Author:
    Mirco Romagnoli

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class javax.swing.RowFilter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean include(RowFilter.Entry<? extends M,? extends I> entry)
      Returns true if the entry must be shown, return false otherwise
      If the entry's date is between the values of minimumDate and maximumDate return true
